definition: the action of parting : the state of being parted : division
examples: the partition of Korea into North and South Korea

definition: something that divides, an interior dividing wall
examples: The bank teller sat behind a glass partition.

definition: one of the parts or sections of a whole
examples: The estate was divided into three partitions.

definition: to divide into parts or shares
to divide (a place, such as a country) into two or more territorial units having separate political status
to separate or divide by a partition (such as a wall)
